profile:
California Green Irrigation are your lawn sprinkler professionals. We offer a wide variety of services including new installations, service and repairs on existing systems and annual maintenance programs.  We pride ourselves in offering our customers the very best care and quality for their lawns and gardens. 

****

CALIFORNIA GREEN IRRIGATION INC. has been a family owned and operated business for over a decade.  Our main objective is our customer service and their satisfaction.

We are fully licensed and insured to bring peace of mind to our customers.
We take pride in being prompt, on time and on budget with every project.
We know what it takes to keep our customers happy and satisfied with our service.


Our Services:

California Green Irrigation offers complete design, installation and maintenance for any size lawn sprinkler system.

We specialize in services such as:

***

Spring Start-ups
Mid-Season Check-ups
Fall Winterizing
Modifications to existing systems such as additions and reworking zones
Our service technicians are very experienced and trained to tackle any project of any size.
service_area: Oakville, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, North York, Etobicoke, Thornhill, Vaughn, Woodbridge, Maple, Scarborough, King City, Ajax, Richmondhill and more...
services: We offer a wide variety of services including new installations, repair and modify existing systems, fall closing and spring opening.
warranty_terms: 5 year warranty on all major products

profile:
Arizona Outdoor Solutions is an industry leader in the design, installation, and management of commercial and residential irrigation systems. We are proud to serve our communities in Southern Ontario, including Hamilton-Wentworth, Waterloo Region, Halton Region, and Wellington County.

We offer a range of maintenance packages to ensure that your irrigation system continues to meet the evolving needs of your property.

profile:
Your property is amongst the largest investments you will make throughout your life time.  So why trust just anyone to install your underground sprinkler system? Waterboy Irrigation has the experience, the know how, the passion and the promise to install the most efficient underground sprinkler system to suite your landscape. No two sprinkler systems are equal and don't let anyone tell you so.  An efficient sprinkler system takes into consideration soil composition, the type of vegetation, sun exposure, landscape and much more. 

****

With a Waterboy Irrigation sprinkler system you can be confident that we first and foremost have your best interest in mind. We take everything into consideration when designing a sprinkler system.  We also try our best to work within your budget as long as it doesn't affect your sprinkler systems efficiency.  No short cuts are taken and no unnecessary additions are installed.  Just the best sprinkler system for your specific property and landscape.  100% guaranteed.

****

Waterboy Irrigation fully guarantees your system for the first three years after installation. You don't pay a single penny for labor or parts should anything malfunction in the first three years.
